channel.title: ~PKing Island & Starting Location~
channel.description: Ok so, I don't want to use the stupid dummy area for starting and training place I want it to be in a diff place... Also I need a place for a Pk Island ... If you want either of these are areas (or both :p) then post cords.. If you don't know cords then just tell me the name of the Island or Starting Location.

item.title: ~PKing Island & Starting Location~
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Mod Nate:

I want an Island … They totally Peen…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 12, 2007, 11:59:45 PM[/size][hr]FFS!!! SOMEONE GIVE ME A FLOOPIN POPPIN PLACE>>>>>>>>>!

See that is how this started.

You double posted and basically are begging people to give you something that you can find out for your self so this wouldn’t of happened if you where mature enough not to do it.

If no one reply’s then no one knows a good island for your sever to start so stop being an idiot and literally stop spamming everyone of the newcomer’s if you can stand them then GTFO these topics.

Read full topic

item.title: ~PKing Island & Starting Location~
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nate Mod Nate
item.description:
@Mod_Nate wrote:

[quote=“Substance, post:8, topic:93814”][quote author=Mod Nate link=topic=136006.msg1317130#msg1317130 date=1179121829]
…To lazy,…
[/quote]

Then making a server isnt for you. Servers are about dedication and Non-laziness… You flame new members for making topics on how to make a server and your asking on the count of being absolutely lazy.

Please stop being a dick on the forums to new members as just because you spammed 50 posts you have Senior Member. Honestly Just Stop.[/quote]

Ahahaha Funny funny funny kid… Server making isnt for me… I have 5 servers that are very well coded so I dont think this is your posision to be talking. And 1 reason I am asking for a cool location is so that members can recomend it so its more enjoyable for them so dont spamm my fucking thread asshole.

Read full topic
